name: RECRUITMENT OF ENGINEERING GRADUATES IN NPCIL THROUGH GATE

details.description: NPCIL is planning to recruit Engineering Graduates as Executive Trainees (ET-2025) in Mechanical, Chemical, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation & Civil Disciplines.

name: Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited (NPCIL) Recruitment

details.Caution Notice: Candidates are requested to read the Caution Notice displayed on https://www.npcilcareers.co.in. In case, you come across any such incident/fraud, you are advised to immediately reach out to appropriate government authorities.
details.Contact Us: Applicants may submit their queries, if any, under "Contact Us". Queries received during the period from 12/03/2025 till 01/04/2025 (13:00 hrs.) will only be entertained. Only valid queries pertaining to recruitment of the posts mentioned in this advertisement and received within the stipulated time will be entertained.
details.FAQ: Candidates are requested to read through the "FAQ" section on https://www.npcilcareers.co.in/
details.About Us: NPCIL strives to have a workforce, which reflects gender balance and women are encouraged to apply. / Be Clean, Be Healthy 5) NPCIL encourages the Swachh Bharat Mission run by the Government of India nf Nuclear Power - An Inevitable Option CHT

name: Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited

details.Eligibility Criteria: Degree in Medicine and relevant experience
